revised_title: An Analysis of Falmouth Magnetographs' Results on 'Quiet' Days from 1891 to 1902
tldr: The author analyzes the results from Falmouth magnetographs on 'quiet' days during the twelve years from 1891 to 1902. The study compares the data with Kew magnetographs and discusses secular change, non-cyclic effects, and the relationship with meteorological phenomena.
